name: The Wrath of Chronos
description:
This is The Wrath of Chronos, a story-driven combat-puzzle platformer that details the journey of Pace as he warps through time to escape the evil Epoch Incorporated and save the world from temporal catastrophe.

Studio Pontiac Team Members: Srikhar Padmanabhan (srikharp), Alex Marquis (alexmarq), Isaac Lee (isaacl), John Li (johnjli)
